sentence.text: The oncogenic potential of circadian rhythm in terms of prognosis and cancer metastasis in arginine prototrophic gastric cancer (GC) remains unclear at present.
circadian rhythm was highly expressed in GC and positively correlated with GC aggressiveness and poor outcome.

Depletion of circadian rhythm led to inhibition of tumor growth and decreased cell invasion via induction of autophagy-lysosome machinery, resulting in degradation of active Î²-catenin, Snail, and Twist.

Ectopic expression of circadian rhythm in GC cells reversed these effects and protected cancer cells from chemotherapy drug-induced apoptosis via activation of the positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-mammalian target of rapamycin signaling pathway.
